summary: Emilia is the main heroine of the web novel, light novel, and anime series Re:Zero, written by Tappei Nagatsuki and illustrated by Shinichiro Otsuka. She is the main love interest of Subaru Natsuki, being the first girl that he meets after he was transported from another world. Emilia is a beautiful silver-haired Half-Elf residing in the Kingdom of Lugnica and is a candidate of the kingdom's Royal Selection that will decide its ruling monarch. full_text:
Emilia (Re:Zero)
Emilia is the main heroine of the web novel, light novel, and anime series Re:Zero, written by Tappei Nagatsuki and illustrated by Shinichiro Otsuka. She is the main love interest of Subaru Natsuki, being the first girl that he meets after he was transported from another world. Emilia is a beautiful silver-haired Half-Elf residing in the Kingdom of Lugnica and is a candidate of the kingdom's Royal Selection that will decide its ruling monarch. However, she is discriminated due to her mixed heritage and near-identical resemblance to Satella, the Witch of Envy. Emilia primarily uses ice-based magic and is accompanied by Puck, a cat-like familiar who serves as her guardian.
Outside of the main series, Emilia also appears in the comedy crossover series Isekai Quartet, featuring chibi versions of characters from four isekai light novels (Re:Zero, Konosuba, Overlord, Tanya) in a high school setting. Her Japanese voice actress, Rie Takahashi, also voices Megumin from Konosuba.
Unlike many anime series, the main heroine of Re:Zero is largely overshadowed in popularity and success in online saimoe tournaments by Rem, a supporting character. This doesn't discount her strength however, as the continued popularity of the series ensures that her presence will be felt for a long time. The half-elf has enjoyed consistent success since her anime debut in 2016, having reached the final of ISML 2017 and finishing in the quarter-finals of r/anime's Best Girl Contest three times (2017, 2020 and 2021). An Emilia vs. Rem knockout match notably happened in the quarter-finals of China's Bilibili Moe 2016, which ended with the silver-haired girl's elimination and the blue oni going on to win the entire tournament.
Icons
Wiki iconWIki icon (LN)ISMLBMoe 2016
ISML record
ISML Profile Flavor Text
 
(written by Momento10)
They loathed her. They detested her. But, she did not care.
Emilia’s unique characteristics make her strikingly similar to a character in a legend feared by all. Subjected to discrimination solely based on her appearance, Emilia has a hard time getting along with anyone, if at all. The only reason she wears a magical cloak all the time is for her to have a normal and decent conversation with the townsfolk. Otherwise, all she will receive is their scorn and fury.
Behind the appearance lies a gentle girl who is willing to help out those in need. She is not one that helps to receive a reward or ask for something in return. Many of her kind gestures stem from her pure heart. Added with her strong sense of justice, and Emilia should be someone everyone ought to be friendly with. Yet, she is so despised that even when she resided in a sovereign’s land, the townsfolk started to fear the sovereign as a possible accomplice towards her. Even so, she wants to treat people with kindness and compassion.
If she wants to be treated fairly, she is going to have to change the way people see her. Perhaps the crest in her hand would be able to provide her the first step towards that goal.
